TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
I have found my mother!
I have found my mother!
I have found my mother!
I have found my mother!
Where is she?
Where is she?
Where is she?
Where is she?
I was flying over the Realms of Death and I happened upon a Dark Dwarven citadel in the mountains.
I was flying over the Realms of Death and I happened upon a Dark Dwarven citadel in the mountains.
I was flying over the Realms of Death and I happened upon a Dark Dwarven citadel in the mountains.
I was flying over the Realms of Death and I happened upon a Dark Dwarven citadel in the mountains.
Kal-Ungar. I've heard the Elves mention it. They believe Lord Bane is getting some type of machinery from them.
Kal-Ungar. I've heard the Elves mention it. They believe Lord Bane is getting some type of machinery from them.
Kal-Ungar. I've heard the Elves mention it. They believe Lord Bane is getting some type of machinery from them.
Kal-Ungar. I've heard the Elves mention it. They believe Lord Bane is getting some type of machinery from them.
I saw my mother there. Bane must have sold her to the Dark Dwarves. They were using her to haul rocks and ore out of a mine.
I saw my mother there. Bane must have sold her to the Dark Dwarves. They were using her to haul rocks and ore out of a mine.
I saw my mother there. Bane must have sold her to the Dark Dwarves. They were using her to haul rocks and ore out of a mine.
I saw my mother there. Bane must have sold her to the Dark Dwarves. They were using her to haul rocks and ore out of a mine.
You did the right thing coming back here, Flicker. We'll go and get her back immediately.
You did the right thing coming back here, Flicker. We'll go and get her back immediately.
You did the right thing coming back here, Flicker. We'll go and get her back immediately.
You did the right thing coming back here, Flicker. We'll go and get her back immediately.
Of course I did the right thing. Do I look stupid to you? She may be my mother, but I'm no match for two dozen Dark Dwarves - well, not without some help anyway.
